commands:
**I know the following commands:**
`1.` help: Shows this list of commands.
`2.` invite: Shows the link to invite this bot!
`3.` stats: Displays general info about me such as my current version.
`4.` say: Makes me say stuff and deletes your message.
`5.` ping: Displays the current latency to the Discord API and my client.
`6.` stealavatar: Steals the avatar URL of the provided user by mention.
`7.` eval: (Owner Only) Evaluates JavaScript.
`8.` shutdown: (Owner Only) Shuts the bot down.
`9.` setavatar: (Owner Only) Changes the bot's avatar.
`10.` setname: (Owner Only) Sets the new name of the bot.
`11.` setstatus: (Owner Only) Sets the new status of the bot, for example *idle*.
`12.` setgame: (Owner Only) Sets the new playing status of the bot.
